special_text:
[+2]: Create a token that's a copy of up to one target artifact or creature you control, except it's an artifact and loses all other types.
[+1]: Target artifact or creature you control becomes a 3/3 Dragon creature with flying and haste in addition to its other types.
[-3]: Eiyo deals 4 damage to any nonplayer target and you gain 4 life. Create X Treasure tokens, where X is the excess damage dealt this way.
[-8]: You get an emblem with “You may cast copies of cards in your graveyard by sacrificing an artifact and exiling the card in addition to its other costs.”
